title: Taekwondo Academy Marketing Website

requirements.text: Create a public marketing website for a Taekwondo academy with a responsive layout and clear navigation, including pages/sections for: Home (hero + highlights), About the Academy, Programs/Classes, Schedule, Instructors, Pricing/Memberships, FAQ, and Contact.

quotes: Make website for my taekwondo academy

acceptanceCriteria: Site has a header navigation that links to each page/section (desktop and mobile).
All pages/sections render well on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
Each page/section contains sensible placeholder English copy that can be replaced later (no lorem ipsum).

requirements.text: Implement a Contact form that allows visitors to submit inquiries (name, email, phone optional, message) and store submissions in the backend canister so they persist across reloads.

quotes: Make website for my taekwondo academy

acceptanceCriteria: Contact form validates required fields (name, email, message) and shows inline errors.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation state and the form resets.
Backend stores inquiries in stable storage and returns them via an API method.
Frontend submits inquiries to the backend and handles loading/error states.

requirements.text: Add a simple admin-only view protected by Internet Identity login that lists submitted contact inquiries (most recent first) for academy staff.

quotes: Make website for my taekwondo academy

acceptanceCriteria: Admin view requires Internet Identity login; unauthenticated users cannot access the inquiry list.
Only the canister-defined admin principal(s) can view inquiries; non-admin authenticated users are denied.
Admin view displays inquiry fields and submission timestamp, and supports basic empty/loading/error states.

requirements.text: Establish a coherent, distinct visual theme for a martial-arts academy brand (colors, typography, spacing, components) and apply it consistently across the site (do not use a blue/purple theme).

quotes: Make website for my taekwondo academy

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistently applied to navigation, buttons, cards/sections, and typography.
Color palette avoids blue/purple as the primary theme colors.
UI uses Tailwind styling and existing UI components without modifying immutable component sources.

requirements.text: Add the required generated static images to the project and use them in the UI (hero and branding areas) from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).

quotes: Make website for my taekwondo academy

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
Home page uses the hero image in the top section.
Brand mark/logo image is used in the header and footer (or equivalent branding area).

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths; only compose/use them.
No third-party authentication providers; if auth is used, use Internet Identity.
nonGoals: Online payments, subscriptions, or e-commerce checkout.
Member portal for students (attendance tracking, belt progression, etc.).
Integration with external CRMs, email services, or social media APIs.

required: Taekwondo academy logo mark with a bold, modern martial-arts aesthetic (tkd-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Wide hero banner image showing a dynamic taekwondo training scene in a clean illustrated style (tkd-hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
Subtle repeating background pattern inspired by martial-arts motifs (tkd-pattern.dim_1024x1024.png)
